about.title: 01. PLAYER INFO
about.bio_p1: I am a Software Developer based in the rural hills of Romita, Guanajuato, specializing in Java and modern JavaScript technologies. I enjoy working on both enterprise-grade systems and practical web applications that solve real-world problems.
about.bio_p2: When I'm not debugging legacy code, you can find me working on my '90s truck, taking care of my family, or building tools that help small businesses go digital. My goal is — to grow into a Senior Full-Stack Developer, combining strong engineering discipline with hands-on creativity.

job1.desc3: Execute pre- and post-mitigation unit and regression tests using JUnit and Mockito, as well as non-affectation transaction testing across multiple acquirers and issuers using ISO 8583 (NCR Authentic 4.5).
